DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study determine safety efficacy sitagliptin patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus inadequate glycemic control insulin insulin/metformin combination therapy .
DOC.criteria: Patient type 2 diabetes mellitus Patient poorly control insulin insulin metformin Patient history type 1 diabetes mellitus history ketoacidosis Patient take oral antidiabetic agent metformin past 3 month Patient currently treatment daily use preprandial shortacting rapidacting insulin
